Footer.description: Pioneers in the most secure real estate tokenization model on Web 3

Home.description: FITAL is revolutionizing the real estate market through tokenization, transforming physical properties into real estate tokens (virtual assets) to simplify their commercialization. Additionally, it offers digital trust services, ensuring assets are protected, and with our wallet, we connect you to the future of the digital economy.

video.description: and take the first step into the digital real estate revolution.

title: How to
tokenize
your property
with FITAL?
tokenize.description: Start by transferring the property to a trust, turning physical properties into virtual assets that can be easily bought, sold, and managed. This simplifies access to the real estate market, enhances liquidity, and reduces the costs associated with traditional real estate transactions.

advantages.title: Advantages over traditional property sales.
cards: Buyers can acquire fractions of multiple properties instead of concentrating all their capital on a single property, reducing risk.
By using blockchain and trusts, many traditional intermediaries are eliminated, significantly reducing transaction costs.
Tokens (virtual assets) can be easily transferred between buyers and sellers without lengthy and complicated procedures.

header.title: Tokenize Your Properties:
header.description: The Future of Real Estate with FITAL

description.title: What is it?
description.description: It’s the process of transforming physical properties into real estate tokens (virtual assets). This allows properties to be divided into smaller fractions, making entry into the real estate market easier and less complicated. Along with the digital trust that holds the properties, hosting them in a blockchain-enabled wallet ensures transparency and security in all transactions.

liquidity.title: Liquidez:
liquidity.description: Tokenization allows physical properties to be divided into tokens (virtual assets) that can be easily bought and sold in secondary markets, enhancing liquidity and making it easier to convert profits into cash.

security.title: Blockchain Security:
security.description: Blockchain technology protects ownership data and transactions through encryption, preventing tampering and ensuring the integrity and security of investments.

transparency.title: Transparency:
transparency.description: All transactions and property records are stored on a blockchain, creating a clear and immutable history that reduces the risk of fraud and errors.

title: Estándar ERC-3643:
Potenciando la

del Mundo Real (RWA)
list: Provides a flexible and secure framework for digitally representing properties and other physical assets.
Enables their transfer and management in a decentralized environment.
ERC-3643 ensures legal compliance and enhances interoperability across different platforms.

security.title: Security:
security.description: Strengthens trust in transactions with tokenized assets.

flexibility.title: Flexibility:
flexibility.description: Adaptable to various types of physical assets.

description.title: What is it?
description.description: A digital trust is a legal tool that uses blockchain technology to securely and transparently manage and protect assets, such as money or properties. Everything is managed on digital platforms, making it faster, more accessible, and reliable.

creation.title: Creation Process
creation.traditional: Traditional: Requires paperwork and in-person legal procedures.
creation.digital: Digital: Managed online quickly and easily.

management.title: Asset Management
management.digital: Digital: Automated and more efficient, using smart contracts.

transparency.title: Transparency and Security
transparency.traditional: Traditional: Relies on reports, and information is not accessible in real time.
transparency.digital: Digital: Transparent and secure thanks to blockchain, with real-time access.

flexibilty.title: Flexibility
flexibilty.traditional: Traditional: Complicated changes requiring new procedures.
flexibilty.digital: Digital: More flexible, with instant modifications.

cost.title: Costs
cost.traditional: Traditional: More expensive due to intermediaries and procedures.
